channel.title: LACMTA Bus GTFS Updates
channel.description: This RSS feed tracks weekly calendar_dates.txt updates to the LA Metro Bus GTFS data.

item.title: Download Updated GTFS
item.description: A new GTFS zip file for LA Metro's bus service has been uploaded with this week's new calendar_dates.txt file. The calendar_dates.txt file contains updated service for the upcoming 2 weeks.
